answers.author: Michael Embury
answers.text:
North Kingstown has been doing zero based budgeting for at least 15 years. Problem is that the public does not understand that, when you build your core responsibilities and functions from year to year, the numbers do not vary greatly unless the Council decides to make significant adjustments.  Until this is done, the assumption is that the governing body and public want the same functions performed by the staff.

author: Michael Lopez
text:
I am researching information regarding Zero Base Budgeting and was wondering if there are cities on here that are currently doing this type of budgeting.  If so:
Are you doing this type of budgeting every budget year?
Any lessons learned that can be shared?
title: Zero Base Budgeting
